snippet: A new education wing, built as part of a renovation that also includes a roof terrace, reflects Carnegie’s evolution from an old-line temple of music to something of a teacher of music.
abstract: Carnegie Hall's education wing, under construction for four years, is set to be unveiled; new wing reflects Carnegie's evolution from old-line temple of music to teacher of music.
lead_paragraph: A new education wing, built as part of a renovation that also includes a roof terrace, reflects Carnegie’s evolution from an old-line temple of music to something of a teacher of music.

headline.seo: Resnick Education Wing Prepares to Open at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: Carnegie Hall Makes Room for Future Stars
headline.print_headline: Carnegie Hall Makes Room for Future Stars
